name: Christopher HESS, Appellant v. Kimberly A. BARKLEY, Secretary Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, and John J. Talaber, Assistant Counsel

parties: Christopher HESS, Appellant v. Kimberly A. BARKLEY, Secretary Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, and John J. Talaber, Assistant Counsel.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of June, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
46 A.3d 1285
Christopher HESS, Appellant v. Kimberly A. BARKLEY, Secretary Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, and John J. Talaber, Assistant Counsel.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 18, 2012.
